home.hero.title: THE FOUNDATION FOR DATA-DRIVEN HEALTHCARE
home.hero.subtitle: An EHR and open platform that truly supports healthcare professionals. Modern, flexible, and built on FHIR standards.
home.solutions.title: FLEXIBLE IT SOLUTIONS FOR YOUR ORGANIZATION
home.solutions.description: AskFrank understands like no other how flexible and user-friendly IT solutions can support your organization to provide the best care. Healthcare technology should work for you, not against you.
home.foundation.title: THE FOUNDATION: STANDARDIZED HEALTHCARE DATA
home.foundation.subtitle: We facilitate this with our open platform AskFrank, built on FHIR and healthcare information building blocks. With our open platform, you prepare your organization for the future.

home.support.title: HEALTHCARE DOESN'T KEEP OFFICE HOURS, NEITHER DO WE WITH OUR 24/7 SUPPORT SERVICE. A SAFE FEELING.
home.cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Healthcare IT?
home.cta.description: Join healthcare organizations that trust AskFrank for their data-driven future. Start with our transparent pricing model at just €0.45 per patient record.
